1: <pb/><e>A ton bit David ti'</e> <pb/><t>A eb yob nabal, chi na eb tol c'am Dios. Junlajanxac'al max yun yetaxtok nabal eb. C'am axcaxa yobal max el yunen eb. C'amxa mac chi unen watx'c'ulalil.</t>
2: <t>Atac'al bay satcan t'anantek Cham Jehová jin, yuj yiloni ta ay junok on chi nachaj el juj, ta ay mac chi naon Cham.</t>
3: <t>A bay jun be yob max on tojcan co masanil. Junlajan max yun jetnentok co ba. Tok ayto wal mactxel chi unen watx' beybalej. Tutun c'am mactxel, tamwal junok.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Axq'uijan wal tol c'am nabal eb unem yobtakil. A eb tu' chi c'ayon el eb wet conob, axcaoktam tol loj, cax c'am chi yal ba eb bay Jehová.</t>
5: <t>Ok aj can is xiwc'ulal eb tu', cax ok bilaj eb, yujtol a Dios ayic' yetok eb tojol beybal.</t>
6: <t>Chi yochej eb chi yetnejtok nabal eb meba', palta a Jehová chi colon eb.</t>
7: <pb/><t>Ta a bay tzalan Sión chi tit co colbanil ayon Israel on ti', a yet ok yak'on Jehová is watx'c'ulal jiban junelxa, ok tzaloj aj co c'ul ayon yinatil on Jacob ti', cax ok el lenaj ok jila'.</t>
